attributes.action: Have a National Holiday If England reach the Euro 2020 Final
attributes.additional_details:
Close all shops, put big screens in parks, with food and drink vendors so we can help out the small independent businesses. Keep pubs open so they can get back into a normal routine again!

Its not just for the beautiful game…..it’s for the country!
attributes.background: To bring the nation together through the tough times we have endured I’ve the last year and a half, The nation should have a national holiday if the England national team reaches the final of Euro 2020!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
